system.description:
Also at 6th level, you gain the Furious Critical berserker feature. You learn one Furious Critical now and an additional Furious Critical at your 8th runespell rager level. You may use your runespell rager levels in place of berserker levels to meet the prerequisites for a Furious Critical.

Your runescar weapon always activates a Furious Critical on a critical hit, even when thrown.

Finally, once per turn when you hit a creature with your runescar weapon, you may expend 4 spell points to activate a Furious Critical even if the attack was not a critical hit.
